IONIAN SEA.
FIVE METER VESSEL, WHITE HULL, SEVEN PERSONS
ON BOARD, DISABLED AND ADRIFT IN AREA BOUND BY
39-15N 019-46E, 39-15N 020-05E,
39-07N 020-26E, 38-35N 020-26E,
38-35N 019-46E.
VESSELS IN VICINITY REQUESTED TO KEEP A SHARP
LOOKOUT, ASSIST IF POSSIBLE. REPORTS TO
JRCC PIRAEUS, TELEX: 601211588, 601211254,
PHONE: 30 210 411 2500, 30 210 422 0772,
FAX: 30 210 413 2398, 30 210 411 5798.
